title: Reuters reveals Indonesia’s defences start crumbling against relentless dollar
dc:creator: Ramisa Tasnim
description:
Reuters exclusively reported Indonesia’s currency is tumbling and foreign money in its bond markets is heading for the exits, stoking […]

The post Reuters reveals Indonesia’s defences start crumbling against relentless dollar appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
content:encoded:
Reuters exclusively reported Indonesia’s currency is tumbling and foreign money in its bond markets is heading for the exits, stoking fears that Southeast Asia’s largest economy is finally starting to crack after months of remarkable resilience against global headwinds.Â 

The post Reuters reveals Indonesia’s defences start crumbling against relentless dollar appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
